results.title: Notornis Expedition
results.brief_description: The New Zealand native flightless bird, the Notornis, or Takahe, thought for 80 years to be extinct, is photographed in its natural surroundings in a practically inaccessible high mountain valley.
results.description: The New Zealand native flightless bird, the Notornis, or Takahe, thought for 80 years to be extinct, is photographed in its natural surroundings in a practically inaccessible high mountain valley.

results.title: Notorious
results.creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: A compelling drama about human relationships, fidelity, betrayal and guilt. Cary Grant plays Devlin, a secret service agent. Ingrid Bergman plays Alicia, the daughter of a convicted traitor whom Devlin enlists in a scheme to investigate the activities of surviving, post-war Nazis in Brazil.
results.description: A compelling drama about human relationships, fidelity, betrayal and guilt. Cary Grant plays Devlin, a secret service agent. Ingrid Bergman plays Alicia, the daughter of a convicted traitor whom Devlin enlists in a scheme to investigate the activities of surviving, post-war Nazis in Brazil.

results.title: Nothing to lose
results.creator_credit: Steve Oedekerk, Michael S. Bregman, Don Jinks, Martin Bregman and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: This comedy and buddy movie stars Tim Robbins and Martin Lawrence as an unlikely duo who find themsleves in the Arizona desert questioning their life choices.

results.title: Nothing sacred
results.creator_credit: William Wellman, David O. Selznick and Selznick International Pictures
results.brief_description: Carol Lombard is hilariously funny playing the role of Hazel Flagg in this outstanding black comedy. Hazel’s bumbling doctor mistakenly diagnoses her as having fatal radium poisoning. Although she’s never felt better, Hazel pretends to be dying in order to accept the offer of an all-expenses-paid visit to New York City made by a newspaper reporter. By the time the reporter begins churning out daily reports of the tragedy, half of Manhattan is in tears and Hazel is built up to be a brave ‘suffering in silence’ charmer and is lionized by the media and public. When Hazel cannot disguise her good health any longer, a group of her financial backers wise up to her ruse and ask her to find a way to die and save them all further embarassment.This was one of the first screwball comedies ever produced, and possibly one of the finest.
results.creator_credit_for_label: William Wellman, David O. Selznick and Selznick International Pictures

results.title: Nothing impossible
results.creator_credit: Aden Daud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When his country was thrown into civil war, Aden Daud’s friends would tell him to just waiting for his time to die. Instead, Daud decided to do something about it and seek out a more secure life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Aden Daud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Notget
results.brief_description: The work traveled as part of the BJORK DIGITAL Exhibition. In the exhibition it is presented as and Oculus Rift experience, and is recorded as a animated VR piece for youtube and online.

results.title: Notes on the Port of St. Francis
results.brief_description: A cinematic “poem” that straddles documentary and experimental traditions capturing the atmosphere of San Francisco. Shows fresh and unexpected scenes of the city and its people in addition to San Francisco’s landmarks. The narration, spoken by Vincent Price, is taken from a descriptive essay on San Francisco written in 1882 by Robert Louis Stevenson.
